alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 05 at 2:55PM CDT until August 05 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SIOUX COUNTY... At 253 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sioux Center, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Sioux Center around 300 PM CDT. One circulation which had produced a tornado was located 1 mile southwest of Sioux Center, with a second circulation developing 1 mile southeast of Sioux Center, moving northeast at 10 mph. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
